content: to last 3 sts ssk k1 turn gauge row 2 ws k3 *mb k1 repeat from * to two sts before m mb 23 sts x 22 row = 4 measured in garter stitch after blocking k1 tbl sm k1 sm k1 tbl mb *k1 mb repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 turn row 3 k1 k2tog k to m yo sm k1 sm yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 finished measurements turn after blocking row 4 k to one st before m k1 tbl sm k1 sm k1 tbl k to end length 60 152 cm turn width 15 5 40 cm repeat row 3-4 fourteen more times break yarn notions tapestry needle stitch markers repeat the color change section 10 more times or until desired length changing to a different color for each section abbreviations bobble bl c1 color 1 co cast on k knit kfb knit in front and in back of the stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together mb make bobble see special stitches p purl pm place marker rs right side sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es tbl through the back loop ws wrong side yo yarn over
